column4: can someone please help me, i have an ATI, when i enable dual monitors or 'big desktop' everytime i restart it goes back to clone mode, what do i need to do to fix this?
edit xorg.conf manually. the gui tools never worked for me so far (including 8.04)
is there a guide somewhere on how to do this? i am completely lost
ati docs and google for ati dual monitor
